name: dlq_processor
description: Lambda function for processing messages from CloudWatch with Dead Letter Queue Support

scripts.build: rm -f cloudwatchlogs-with-dlq.zip && npm install && zip -r cloudwatchlogs-with-dlq.zip DLQProcessor.js cloudwatchlogs_lambda.js vpcutils.js package.json sumo-dlq-function-utils/ node_modules/

author: Himanshu Pal
